mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(d.device_id) count, i.intermediary_name from device d RIGHT JOIN intermediary i on d.intermediary_id = i.intermediary_id GROUP BY i.intermediary_name ORDER BY count DESC
SELECT COUNT(i.intermediary_id), a.name FROM intermediary i LEFT JOIN area a ON i.area_id = a.ID GROUP BY a.name
SELECT COUNT(p.project_id), a.`NAME` FROM project p LEFT JOIN area a ON p.area_id = a.ID WHERE p.project_status = 1 GROUP BY a.name
